price: (Onipa) bͻneni bεn na ͻkyεn obi a, osi (nnipa) kwan wͻ Nyamedan ho sε yεbεbͻ Nyankopͻn din wɔ hɔ, na ɔbɔ mmͻden (biara) sε ͻbεgu no anaa ͻbεsεe no? Saa nkorͻfoɔ no na wͻ’nni ho kwan sε wͻ’wura (Nyamedan) no mu, gyesε ehuu mu. (Saa nkorͻfoͻ no) wͻ animguaseε wͻ wiase, na Daakye no nso wͻ’wͻ asotwee kεseε paa.
arabic: وَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّن مَّنَعَ مَسَٰجِدَ ٱللَّهِ أَن يُذۡكَرَ فِيهَا ٱسۡمُهُۥ وَسَعَىٰ فِي خَرَابِهَآۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مَا كَانَ لَهُمۡ أَن يَدۡخُلُوهَآ إِلَّا خَآئِفِينَۚ لَهُمۡ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا خِزۡيٞ وَلَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waman aẓlamu mimman manaʿa masājida al-lahi an yudh'kara fīhā us'muhu wasaʿā fī kharābihā ulāika mā kāna lahum an yadkhulūhā illā khāifīna lahum fī al-dun'yā khiz'yun walahum fī al-ākhirati ʿadhābun ʿaẓīmun
